byline.contributor: Hannah Olivennes contributed reporting from London and Jack Ewing from Frankfurt.

abstract: European news media, as Donald J Trump continues to win primaries, is adjusting to prospect he will become Republican presidential nominee; reactions include confusion, anger, anxiety, and some admiration; media is focusing on satire angle and his more outrageous statements instead of serious examination.
lead_paragraph: Once dismissive of Mr. Trump’s presidential candidacy, European news media are adjusting to the prospect of a seemingly unstoppable Trump juggernaut.

headline.main: Donald Trump Elicits Shock and Biting Satire in European Media
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Successes, Once Inconceivable, Inspire Satirists in Europe

snippet: Once dismissive of Mr. Trump’s presidential candidacy, European news media are adjusting to the prospect of a seemingly unstoppable Trump juggernaut.
